rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A minimalist entry that welcomes guests with an open design and a pathway to the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: An expansive living space merging into the central courtyard for natural light and air flow.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: A compact kitchen area with built-in appliances and minimalist cabinetry, adjacent to a small dining nook.

rooms.name: Dining Nook
rooms.description: An integrated dining space within the living area for casual meals with a view of the courtyard.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A minimalist bathroom designed to be functional yet stylish, placed near the living area for convenience.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the courtyard.

openings.description: A streamlined doorway facilitating smooth transition from the entrance to the living area.
Large window openings on the bedroom balcony for ample natural light and ventilation.
French windows linking the living area with the central courtyard, promoting an open interior.
A patio door that opens up the kitchenette to a private section of the courtyard.
A door connecting the bedroom with its balcony overlooking the central courtyard.

features.name: Water Feature
features.description: A minimalist water fountain placed at the center of the courtyard to promote positive energy.

features.name: Greenery
features.description: Native plants arranged to enhance air quality and adhere to Vastu principles for balanced living.

notes.building_norms: Complies with local building codes, ensuring structural integrity on a corner plot.
notes.vastu_principles: The central courtyard is oriented towards the east-west axis to harness natural energy. Bedrooms are positioned in the north and south zones to maintain harmony.
